description: Product reviews database. Linked to products.json via productId and users.json via userId.

title: Absolute Beast!
comment: The iPhone 17 Pro Max is incredibly fast. The camera zoom is unlike anything I've seen.

title: Great but Heavy
comment: Performance is 10/10, but it is quite heavy for one-handed use.

title: Best Display Ever
comment: The brightness on this screen is insane even under direct sunlight.

title: Expensive upgrade
comment: It's a good phone, but not much different from my 16 Pro Max.

title: Battery Life is King
comment: I can go two full days without charging. Highly recommend for travelers.

title: Perfect Size
comment: The 17 Pro is the sweet spot. All the power of the Max but fits in my pocket.

title: Sleek and Fast
comment: Love the new titanium color. Very fast, though it gets a bit warm during gaming.

title: Shipping Issues
comment: Phone is great, but the box arrived crushed. Expected better for this price.

title: Pro Cameras are unreal
comment: The macro photography on this is professional grade.

title: Smooth 120Hz
comment: The ProMotion display makes everything feel like butter.

title: Best Value iPhone
comment: Don't need the Pro features. The base iPhone 15 is perfect for most people.

title: Love the Pink!
comment: The pastel colors this year are beautiful. FaceID is very snappy.

title: Still 60Hz?
comment: Great phone but Apple should really give us a higher refresh rate screen by now.

title: USB-C at last
comment: Finally I can use the same cable for my iPad and my iPhone.

title: Solid upgrade
comment: Coming from an iPhone 11, the difference in screen quality is massive.

title: The Big Screen Lover's Dream
comment: I wanted the big screen without the Pro Max price tag. This is it.

title: Battery is insane
comment: This actually outlasts my friend's Pro Max. Lightweight for the size too.

title: Good for movies
comment: Watching Netflix on this while traveling is great. Huge display.

title: Too big for me
comment: I regret getting the Plus. It's too hard to use with one hand.

title: Reliable
comment: Simple, big, and works perfectly. No complaints.

title: Bring back the Mini!
comment: I love that I can reach every corner of the screen with my thumb.

title: Small battery
comment: Love the size, hate that I have to charge it by 6 PM every day.

title: Pocket Friendly
comment: Finally a phone that doesn't feel like a brick in my gym shorts.

title: Powerful Small Phone
comment: It's amazing how much tech they fit in this tiny body.

title: Niche but great
comment: If you have small hands, this is the only phone worth buying.

title: Classic Design, Modern Speed
comment: I love having a home button again. It's so fast for such a small, affordable phone.

title: Old school screen
comment: The chip is fast, but the screen feels very dated with those huge borders.

title: Perfect for my kids
comment: Affordable and durable. It runs every game they want without lag.

title: Great value
comment: Hard to beat this price for an Apple device that will get updates for years.

title: Battery dies fast
comment: If you use your phone a lot, this isn't for you. I have to charge it twice a day.

title: Silky smooth
comment: The silicone feels premium and the MagSafe magnets are very strong.

title: Attracts lint
comment: Beautiful case, but it's a magnet for pocket lint and dust.

title: Saved my phone!
comment: Dropped my phone on concrete from 5 feet. Not a scratch thanks to this case.

title: Pricey but worth it
comment: You can find cheaper cases, but the fit and finish here is perfect.

title: Great Color Range
comment: The Storm Blue matches my phone perfectly. Very happy.

title: Must have
comment: Charges my phone from 0 to 50% in about 30 minutes. Original is best.

title: Reliable
comment: It doesn't get hot like the cheap third-party chargers I've tried.

title: Should be in the box
comment: Annoyed that I have to pay extra for a charger. Works fine though.

title: Compact
comment: Small enough to fit in my travel bag without taking up space.

title: Good quality
comment: Solid build. I trust it with my expensive phone.

title: Very convenient
comment: Fits 3 cards perfectly. The Find My support gives me peace of mind.

title: Falls off occasionally
comment: The magnet is good, but it can slide off when I put it in tight jeans.

title: Beautiful Leather
comment: The leather patinas nicely over time. Looks better now than when I bought it.

title: Minimalist Dream
comment: I finally stopped carrying a huge bulky wallet. ID and one credit card is all I need.

title: Lost it in 2 days
comment: Magnet isn't strong enough. It fell off somewhere and I couldn't find it.

title: Shows off the color
comment: I bought the Gold iPhone and this case shows it off perfectly while protecting it.

title: Buttons are stiff
comment: The case is very hard plastic. It makes pressing the side buttons really difficult.

title: Doesn't yellow
comment: Had it for a month and so far no yellowing like the cheap clear cases.

title: Great fit
comment: Snaps on tightly. MagSafe works perfectly with my car mount.

title: Slippery
comment: The plastic is quite slick. I've almost dropped it a few times.

title: The Ultra King
comment: The AI features on the S24 Ultra actually changed how I work. The S Pen is smoother than ever.

title: Best screen on any phone
comment: The anti-reflective coating is a game changer. Docked one star because it's very expensive.

title: Great Mid-range
comment: Feels like a flagship without the flagship price. Screen is beautiful.

title: Solid Battery
comment: Lasts all day even with heavy use. Camera is good enough for social media.

title: A bit slow
comment: It stutters occasionally when many apps are open. Otherwise okay.

title: Good for the price
comment: You get a lot of phone for your money here. Simple and reliable.

title: The real flagship killer
comment: The S23 FE has everything I need. The telephoto lens is surprisingly good.

title: Perfect upgrade
comment: Clean UI and great build quality. Happy with this purchase.

title: Bezels are huge
comment: The screen borders look like a phone from 2019. Disappointing design.

title: Fast Charging
comment: Charges quickly and stays cool during use.

title: Amazing for basic use
comment: Bought this for my grandpa. Large buttons and clear screen. He loves it.

title: Solid Budget 5G
comment: 5G speeds are great on this. The plastic back feels a bit cheap but I use a case anyway.

title: Screen is better than expected
comment: 120Hz on a budget phone? Samsung is killing it.

title: Super Fast Indeed
comment: My S24 Ultra goes from 0 to 100% in no time. Definitely worth getting the official Samsung plug.

title: Essential Replacement
comment: Lost my original S Pen. This one works perfectly, pressure sensitivity is spot on.

title: Pricey for a plastic stick
comment: It works, but $50 for a stylus is a bit much.

title: Great Battery Life
comment: The M54 is a battery beast. I easily get two days out of it.

title: Best Android Buds
comment: The noise cancellation is top-tier. Fits comfortably even during long flights.

title: Great sound, okay fit
comment: Sound quality is amazing. They tend to slide out a bit when I'm running though.

title: Like New
comment: Was worried about buying refurbished, but it looks brand new and the battery health is 98%.

title: Laptop Replacement
comment: The M2 chip is a monster. I do all my 4K video editing on this 12.9-inch screen now.

title: Blooming on screen
comment: The Mini-LED is bright, but I see some 'blooming' effects in dark rooms. Expensive for these flaws.

title: The Sweet Spot
comment: The iPad Air is the perfect balance of price and performance for most students.

title: Great for Art
comment: Paired with the Pencil, it's a digital artist's dream. Only wish it had FaceID.

title: Best Digital Journal
comment: The size of the Mini is perfect for reading and taking notes on the go.

title: Fun Colors!
comment: Got the Blue one. It's great for watching YouTube and browsing. Kids love it too.

title: Compact Pro
comment: All the power of the 12.9 but easier to carry around. The M2 chip is overkill but I love it.

title: A Massive Canvas
comment: The S9 Ultra screen is simply breathtaking. It's like carrying a portable cinema. Perfect for professional artists.

title: Huge but powerful
comment: Amazing performance, but it's almost too big to use as a tablet. Feels more like a laptop screen.

title: Great Value Tablet
comment: The FE version gives you the premium feel for a much lower price. The S Pen being included is a huge plus.

title: Perfect for Students
comment: The A9+ is smooth, has a great refresh rate for the price, and handles multitasking easily.

title: Average Cameras
comment: The screen is great, but the cameras are pretty poor. Fine for zoom calls but not much else.

title: Still going strong
comment: Bought the S8 even though the S9 is out. Still very fast and the display is top tier.

title: The Media King
comment: Best tablet for watching movies in bed. The speakers are surprisingly loud and clear.

title: The Smartest Power Bank
comment: The display showing the wattage is so helpful. It charges my MacBook Pro at full speed!

title: A Heavy Brick
comment: It has massive capacity but it is very heavy to carry in a pocket.

title: Reliable Travel Partner
comment: 20K capacity is perfect for long flights. I can charge my phone 4 times easily.

title: Official Quality
comment: Fits perfectly with my Samsung phone. Supports the Super Fast Charging protocol.

title: Too Small
comment: It only gives my iPhone about 60% charge. It's convenient because it sticks to the back, but low capacity.

title: Integration is key
comment: The way it shows the battery percentage in the iOS widget is why I bought it.

title: Powerful and Slim
comment: 65W out of a power bank this thin is impressive. Charges my laptop perfectly.

title: DSLR Excellence
comment: The 90D is a workhorse. Great for both stills and video. The autofocus is super fast.

title: Professional Grade
comment: The D850 is still one of the best cameras ever made. Resolution and dynamic range are unmatched.

title: Great Entry Level
comment: Perfect first camera for learning photography. Easy to use and takes great photos for the price.

title: Solid Hybrid
comment: Does everything well. Great low light performance and very reliable build.

title: Gaming Beast
comment: This laptop shreds through every game I throw at it. The RGB lighting looks amazing.

title: Runs very hot
comment: Performance is good, but the fans are very loud and the keyboard gets uncomfortably warm.

title: The Best Windows Laptop
comment: Beautiful screen and premium build. It's the only laptop that rivals the MacBook Pro.

title: Business Essential
comment: Incredibly light and the keyboard is the best in the industry. Highly recommend for work.

title: Solid Home PC
comment: Compact design and fast enough for all my daily tasks. Great value desktop.

title: Immersive Gaming
comment: The curve on this monitor is perfect. 144Hz makes a huge difference in competitive play.

title: The Productivity King
comment: The scroll wheel on the MX Master 3S is a work of art. My wrist pain disappeared after switching to this mouse.

title: Stunning Camera
comment: Upgraded from the 12 Pro and the 15 Pro's camera is a massive leap forward. Titanium feel is very premium.

title: Best Android Phone
comment: The S24 Ultra is simply the most complete phone on the market. AI features are actually useful.

title: Impressive Hardware
comment: The Leica camera system is incredible. MIUI takes some getting used to if you're coming from Pixel.

title: Fast and Smooth
comment: OnePlus is back! The charging speed is mind-blowingâ€”0 to 100 in about 30 minutes.

title: Smartest Phone Ever
comment: Pixel 8's call screening and voice typing are years ahead of Apple. Battery could be better though.

title: Reliable Power
comment: Anker never fails. This power bank has survived three camping trips and still works like a charm.

title: Slow but Convenient
comment: It's nice to just snap it on, but it charges much slower than a wired cable.

title: Real Super Fast Charging
comment: Paired this with my S24 Ultra. The charging animation turns blue to show it's working at 45W. Perfect.

title: Tank-like Protection
comment: Spigen Rugged Armor has been my go-to for 5 years. Dropped my phone on tiles and it's fine.

title: Great Value Buds
comment: The fit is actually better than the Pro model for me because of the 'wingtips'. Great ANC for the price.

title: Life Saver
comment: I put one on my keys and one in my wallet. Found my keys in the couch cushions in 2 minutes using Precision Finding.

title: Adhesive is weak
comment: The holder looks nice, but it fell off my dashboard after a week in the summer heat.

title: Workhorse DSLR
comment: The 90D is perfect for wildlife. The crop sensor gives my lenses extra reach and the burst rate is fantastic.

title: Reliable and Tough
comment: Nikon's build quality is unmatched. I've used this in the rain and dust with no issues at all.

title: Mirrorless Perfection
comment: The Eye-AF on the A7 IV is like magic. I haven't missed a single shot at a wedding since I switched.

title: Tactile and Beautiful
comment: I love the physical dials on the X-T5. It makes photography feel intentional again. The film sims are great.

title: Sharpest Lens I Own
comment: The RF 24-70mm is expensive, but it stays on my camera 90% of the time. Edge-to-edge sharpness is incredible.

title: Best Stabilization
comment: Hypersmooth 6.0 is insane. It looks like I'm using a gimbal while I'm actually mountain biking.

title: Light and Sturdy
comment: Perfect for travel. It fits in my carry-on and holds my DSLR with a heavy lens without wobbling.

title: Silence the World
comment: The ANC on these Sony's is frighteningly good. I can finally work in peace in noisy coffee shops.

title: Outdoor Party Speaker
comment: The bass on the Charge 5 is punchy and it's actually waterproof. Dropped it in the pool and it kept playing.

title: True Surround Sound
comment: Having actual rear speakers for this price is a steal. Movies feel so much more immersive now.

title: Clear Dialog
comment: The Q-Symphony feature works perfectly with my Samsung TV. No more struggling to hear what actors are saying.

title: Air 5 is Incredible
comment: The M1 chip in this iPad Air makes it fly. I use it for Procreate and there is zero lag even with 50+ layers.

title: Best Android Tablet
comment: The OLED screen on the Tab S9 is stunning. Watching HDR content is a whole different experience compared to my old LCD tablet.

title: Insane Specs
comment: Realme really pushed the boundaries here. The charging speed and the brightness of the screen are industry-leading.

title: Camera Magic
comment: The P60 Pro takes the best night photos I've ever seen. The variable aperture is a real game changer for mobile photography.

title: Tough Cable
comment: This Baseus cable is thick and well-braided. It handles 100W charging for my laptop without getting warm.

title: Clean Desk Setup
comment: The Belkin pad looks great on my nightstand. It's not the fastest charger, but it's very reliable.

title: Powerful Car Charger
comment: Finally a car charger that can actually charge my MacBook! 65W from a cigarette lighter is amazing.

title: Battery for Days
comment: The iPhone 14 Plus is the sleeper hit. I get almost two full days of use, and the screen size is perfect for watching movies on the train. Best value big iPhone.

title: USB-C Finally!
comment: Switching to the iPhone 15 was worth it just for the USB-C port. The Dynamic Island is actually helpful for tracking my Uber and music. Colors are beautiful too.

title: A19 Pro is a Beast
comment: The iPhone 17 Pro is ridiculously fast. The new 48MP Telephoto lens makes a huge difference in clarity for zoomed shots. Also, the orange color is stunning.

title: The Battery King
comment: I've never had a phone last this long. The iPhone 17 Pro Max is an absolute unit. The 3,000 nit screen is actually visible in the direct desert sun.
